lead_paragraph: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said certain vehicles can roll away when the driver mistakenly thinks the transmission is set on “park.”

headline.print_headline: Inquiry Over Fiat Chrysler Roll-Away Concern Widens to 856,000 Vehicles
headline.main: Federal Inquiry Widens Over Fiat Chrysler Roll-Away Complaints

snippet: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said certain vehicles can roll away when the driver mistakenly thinks the transmission is set on “park.”
abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Administration steps up probe into 856,000 Fiat Chrysler cars, raising worry that vehicles could roll away when drivers believe automatic transmission is set on 'park'.
